Export.Routine: MIF230ESP01(mi) ;08/04/2003 ; Sebia Capillarys (Bi_Direccional) s mi=$g(mi) i '$l(mi) q k ^TMIF(mi,10) s $zt="err^MIF000" i $$select^LVBMIMP(mi) q f j=1:1:PLIST s @("par"_j)=PLIST(j) s stx=$c(2),etx=$c(3),ack=$c(6),nak=$c(21),eot=$c(4),blank="",$p(blank," ",156)="" i $$start^MIF000() q f d Main i $$stop^MIF000() q c par4 q Main ; bucle principal s record=$$read^MIF000(stx,etx) q:'$l(record) s feot=0 i $f(record,eot) s record=$P(record,eot),feot=1 i record=$c(6) s record="ACK" i record=$c(21) s record="NACK" d trace^MIF000(mi,record,"H<--M") i $l(record)=16 d ACK,PETI ;PeticiÃ³n de Paciente i $l(record)>16 d ACK,RES ;Envio RESultados q READ ; Esperando 'ack' de la maquina s z=$$read^MIF000(stx,etx_","_eot) q:'$l(record) i z=ack d trace^MIF000(mi,"ACK","H<--M") i z'=ack d trace^MIF000(mi,z,"H<--M") q PETI ;respuesta a peticion s (rec,epis,episfin,edad,nombre)="" s epis=$tr($e(record,2,16)," ") s epis=$p(epis,".",1) i epis'="" d .i $d(^TEPI(epis))'=0 d ..s episfin=$e(epis_blank,1,15) ..s edad=$e($tr($j($p(^TEPI(epis),"\",25),3)," ","0"),1,3) ..s nombre=$e($p(^TEPI(epis),"\",2)_" "_$p(^TEPI(epis),"\",1)_" "_$p(^TEPI(epis,0),"\",23)_blank,1,30) .. s gfho=$p(^TEPI(epis),"\",20),gfho=$e(gfho_blank,1,20) .. s gfhd=$p(^TEPI(epis),"\",20),gfhd=$e(gfhd_blank,1,30) .. s ptot=$e($tr($j($$PTOT(epis),5)," ","0"),1,5) ; proteinas totales ..s rec="A0000"_episfin_nombre_$tr($zd($p(^TEPI(epis),"\",4),4,,4),"/")_$p(^TEPI(epis),"\",3)_edad ..s rec=rec_gfho_$tr($zd($p(^TEPI(epis),"\",8),4,,4),"/")_ptot_gfhd_$e(blank,1,120) i $l(rec)=0 d .s rec="A0000"_episfin_$e(blank,1,30)_$e(blank,1,8)_" "_" "_$e(blank,1,20)_$e(blank,1,8)_blank w stx_rec_$s(feot:eot,1:etx),*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,rec,"H-->M") q RES ;Envio de Resultados s (sample,epis,surname,result,date,time,QC)="" s epis=$tr($e(record,6,20)," ") s epis=$p(epis,".",1) i epis="" q s date=$e(record,258,266) s date=$e(date,7,8)_$e(date,3,4)_$e(date,1,2),date=$$intdate^SSUTIL4(date) f d=1:1:10 d .i $tr($e(record,257+(d*10),257+(d*10)+9)," ")'="" d ..s result=result_$tr($e(record,257+(d*10),257+(d*10)+9)," ")_$c(par10)_$tr($e(record,362+(d*5),362+(d*5)+4)," ")_$c(par10)_$c(par11) f d=1:1:2 d .i $tr($e(record,457+(d*10),457+(d*10)+9)," ")'="" d ..d trace^MIF000(mi,$e(record,457+(d*10),457+(d*10)+9)_" | "_(457+(d*10)),"XD") ..d trace^MIF000(mi,$e(record,502+(d*5),502+(d*5)+4)_" | "_(502+(d*5)),"XD") ..s result=result_$tr($e(record,457+(d*10),457+(d*10)+9)," ")_$c(par10)_$tr($e(record,502+(d*5),502+(d*5)+4)," ")_$c(par10)_$c(par11) s result=result_"AG"_$c(par10)_$e(record,548,552)_$c(par10)_$c(par11) d trace^MIF000(mi,result,"XD") i $l(result) d file^MIF000(mi,sample,epis,surname,result,date,time,QC) q ACK ; send 'ack' to instrument w stx,ack,etx,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,"ACK","H-->M") q NACK ; send 'NACK' to instrument w stx,nak,etx,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,"NACK","H-->M") q PTOT(epis) ; ^TEPI(310820,1,"B340",1,"DATA","B6053")=233\\ s (ts,tscnt,ret)="" f s ts=$o(^TEPI(epis,1,ts)) q:ts="" d q:ret'="" . f s tscnt=$o(^TEPI(epis,1,ts,tscnt)) q:tscnt="" d q:ret'="" .. i $d(^TEPI(epis,1,ts,tscnt,"DATA","B6055")) s ret=$p(^TEPI(epis,1,ts,tscnt,"DATA","B6055"),"\",1) q ret
